name: Dungeon.EXE
description:
Dungeon.EXE, an alleged dungeon crawler, but you're struggling to make it into the game. The (menu?) talks too much, and doesn't seem to want to let you through. Solve its riddles and fulfill your destiny in this sketchy game/menu mashup.

Made w/ love for Pigsquad's Summer Slow Jams

Programming: Max and Cody
Art: Nick

Original Soundtrack by codo

Thanks for playing!
